item.title: Chaos engineering using Docker compose
item.description: Chaos engineering using Docker compose By Richard Rostad Chaos Engineering: A systematic approach to pushing a system encironment outside its comfort zone in order to leard about the system(s) under test and discover potential problems before they become actual problems.
